Blowfish::PJ Namespace Reference

Contains a "special" blowfish crypt for PagesJaunes. More...

Functions

  • MC2String encrypt (const MC2String &key, const vector< char > &iv, const MC2String &str)

Detailed Description

Contains a "special" blowfish crypt for PagesJaunes.

These functions will not work with normal openssl programs.
